title: Fix menu failing to load

requirements.text: Investigate and fix the menu data failing to load on the Menu Management screen. The issue was reported in Version 6. Ensure the backend query for fetching all menu items returns data correctly, and that the frontend MenuManagement page and OrderTaking page both successfully retrieve and display menu items grouped by category. Handle any actor initialization, deserialization, or migration errors that may be preventing menu data from loading.

quotes: the menu is failed to load

acceptanceCriteria: The Menu Management screen loads and displays all menu items grouped by their categories without any error state.
The Order Taking screen loads and displays all menu items grouped by category in the accordion sections.
No 'failed to load' or error message is shown on either page under normal operation.
The backend getMenuItems (or equivalent) query returns all seeded menu items successfully.
If the menu store was empty due to a migration issue, re-seeding or re-migration restores all 72 items across 10 categories.

constraints: Do not alter the existing menu data schema or seeded item names and prices.
Do not modify files listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Adding new menu items or categories beyond what is already seeded.
Changing the visual theme or layout of the menu screens.
Modifying the order taking, billing, or reports functionality.
